value:en: "%{control}" cannot be uploaded. Files must be one of the following file types: portable document format (.pdf), comma-separated values (.csv), images (.jpg, .jpeg, .png), Microsoft Excel (.xls, xlsx), Microsoft Word (.doc, .docx), Open Office (.odt, .ods), plain text (.txt), rich text (.rtf).
value:cy: Ni gafodd y "%{control}" ei lwytho’n llwyddiannus ac mae o’r math anghywir
